dcterms:description: nuScenes is a large-scale dataset for autonomous driving that includes 3D object detection annotations for 1,000 scenes, with 700 scenes for training and 300 for testing. Each scene is annotated every 0.5 seconds with a full 360-degree view, and the dataset contains point clouds densiÔ¨Åed by non-keyframe sweeps.
